Programs

Choose a program that fits your goals. Click a card to see details, entry requirements, and apply now.

{/* ---- Main Content ---- */}
{/* ---- Programs Grid ---- */}

Kuttab (Integrated Nursery)

Comprehensive program covering management principles, entrepreneurship, and business strategy for future leaders.

Lower & Upper Basics Creche

Early childhood education that builds strong academic foundations, nurtures creativity, and develops essential life skills in a supportive environment.

Tahfizul Qur'an & Sunnah

A structured program for memorizing the Qur‚Äôan and learning the Sunnah with proper understanding, discipline, and spiritual guidance.

Madrasa (Islamiyyah)

Focused on Islamic studies, values, and character building while integrating academic learning for a balanced education.

Adult Classes (Arabic, Marital Life, Children Upbringing, etc.)

Special courses designed for adults to enhance knowledge in Arabic, family life, parenting, and other practical areas of personal growth.

Rashid GAP year Program

A life-enriching program that equips young adults with skills, discipline, and exposure before pursuing higher education or career paths.

Skills Acquisition

Hands-on training in various vocational and technical skills to empower learners with practical knowledge for entrepreneurship and self-reliance.

Capacity Building & Personality Development

Workshops and training sessions aimed at enhancing leadership, confidence, and personal growth to prepare individuals for real-world challenges.

Vacation Edutainments

Engaging holiday programs that blend education with fun activities, keeping children productive, creative, and socially active during breaks.

Extra Curricular Activities

A wide range of sports, clubs, and creative activities to promote teamwork, talent discovery, and holistic development beyond the classroom.
